text: "Daydreams About Night Things" is a 1975 song by country artist Ronnie Milsap and is the first single from his sixth studio album Night Things. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 2 on the Canadian RPM country tracks chart. Category:1975 songs Category:Country songs Category:Ronnie Milsap songs
title: Daydreams About Night Things
